trans-unit.source: Average effort to farm a block in the last 30 days.
trans-unit.target: Average effort to farm a block in the last 30 days.

trans-unit.source: Profitability based on blocks farmed on last 30 days. Estimated value (XCH) a farmer would get per TiB per day.
trans-unit.target: Profitability based on blocks farmed on last 30 days. Estimated value (XCH) a farmer would get per TiB per day.

trans-unit.source: The effort that was required to farm the block. 100% is the expected estimated time to win. Lower than 100% means we farmed the block before the estimation. Higher than 100% means we took longer than anticipated.
trans-unit.target: The effort that was required to farm the block. 100% is the expected estimated time to win. Lower than 100% means we farmed the block before the estimation. Higher than 100% means we took longer than anticipated.

trans-unit.source: No blocks found by this farmer!
farmer doesn't exist, has left and/or has been removed.
trans-unit.target: фермер не существует, ушел и/или был удален.

trans-unit.source: Learn how to set name here.
Use above link to refer people to this pool. They will be required to join the pool and login to the website to confirm the referral.
trans-unit.target: Use above link to refer people to this pool. They will be required to join the pool and login to the website to confirm the referral.

trans-unit.source: No referrals found for this farmer!
trans-unit.target: No referrals found for this farmer!

trans-unit.source: Failed to authenticate! Check your URL and try again.
trans-unit.target: Не удалось пройти аутентификацию! Проверьте URL-адрес и повторите попытку.

trans-unit.source: What are non-portable (OG) and portable plots (NFT)?
trans-unit.target: Что такое непортативные (OG) и портативные участки (NFT)?

trans-unit.source: Can I join a pool with non-portable (OG) plots?
trans-unit.target: Могу ли я присоединиться к пулу с непортативным участком (OG)?

trans-unit.source: Can I switch from/to your pool whenever I want?
trans-unit.target: Могу ли я переключиться с вашего/к вашему пулу в любое время?

trans-unit.source: How many portable plots do I need to join the pool?
trans-unit.target: Сколько портативных участков мне нужно, чтобы присоединиться к пулу?

trans-unit.source: How to set name in explorer? (alias)
Do you have any other questions?
Payouts will happen within 5 minutes of the farmed block. These terms are subjected to change and will be communicated 1 week prior to the change in this website and on Discord channel.
trans-unit.target: Выплаты будут происходить в течение 5 минут после фермерского блока. Эти условия могут быть изменены и будут сообщены за 1 неделю до изменений на этом веб-сайте и на канале Discord.

trans-unit.source: A reward of 1.75 XCH will be distributed to pool farmers, 0 XCH (nothing) is kept to the pool.
trans-unit.target: Вознаграждение в размере 1,75 XCH будет распределена среди фермеров пула, ничего не сохраняется в пуле.

trans-unit.source: If a reward of 1.75 XCH is found, only 1% of that, 0.0175 will be kept to the pool as a fee. The remaining 1.7325 XCH will be distributed to pool farmers.
trans-unit.target: Если будет найдено вознаграждение в размере 1,75 XCH, только 1% от этого вознаграждения, 0,0175 будет храниться в пуле в качестве комиссии. Оставшиеся 1,7325 XCH будут распределены среди фермеров пула.

trans-unit.source: We use PPLNS (Pay Per Last N Shares) to distribute rewards. When a block is won, we look at the valid partials (shares) submitted by all users in the pool since last payout and distribute the reward value based on your share among all farmers in the pool. In our case Last N Shares refers to partials since last payout. We believe this system is far more fair for less frequent rewards (when Last N Shares means only last few hours), since people contributing for more time will get more rewards. Once our estimated time to win gets below 48 hours we plan on changing the Last N Shares to 48 hours of valid partials.
trans-unit.target: We use PPLNS (Pay Per Last N Shares) to distribute rewards. When a block is won, we look at the valid partials (shares) submitted by all users in the pool since last payout and distribute the reward value based on your share among all farmers in the pool. In our case Last N Shares refers to partials since last payout. We believe this system is far more fair for less frequent rewards (when Last N Shares means only last few hours), since people contributing for more time will get more rewards. Once our estimated time to win gets below 48 hours we plan on changing the Last N Shares to 48 hours of valid partials.

trans-unit.source: Make sure you are running official Chia client 1.2.0 or later.
trans-unit.target: Убедитесь, что у вас запущен официальный клиент Chia версии 1.2.0 или более поздней версии.

trans-unit.source: Sync your full node and wallet
before joining the pool, your node and wallet must be fully synchronized with Chia blockchain
trans-unit.target: перед присоединением к пулу, ваши нода и кошелек должны быть полностью синхронизированы с блокчейном Chia

trans-unit.source: you are going to need 1 mojo (0.000000000001 XCH) which you can get through our faucet service on Discord channel or through Faucet website:
trans-unit.target: Вам понадобится 1 моджо (0.000000000001 XCH), который вы можете получить через наш фаусет сервис на канале Discord или на веб-сайте Faucet:

trans-unit.source: go to the “Pool” tab, and click on “Join the Pool”
trans-unit.target: перейдите на вкладку «Пул» и нажмите «Присоединиться к пулу»

trans-unit.source: choose “Connect to pool” and enter the url: https://pool.openchia.io (exactly, no ending slash) then wait for pool description to appear
trans-unit.target: выберите «Подключиться к пулу» и введите URL-адрес: https://pool.openchia.io (без слэша в конце), затем дождитесь появления описания пула

trans-unit.source: click the “Create” button. In the next couple of minutes, the Plot NFT will be created, and it will appear in your “Pool” tab
trans-unit.target: нажмите кнопку «Создать». В ближайшие пару минут будет создан Plot NFT, который появится на вкладке «Пул».

trans-unit.source: You can now start creating Plots in “Plots” tab using this new Plot NFT to start farming XCH
trans-unit.target: You can now start creating Plots in “Plots” tab using this new Plot NFT to start farming XCH

trans-unit.source: Go to "Pool" menu in the left menu
trans-unit.target: Перейдите в меню «Пул» в левом меню

trans-unit.source: If you already have a Plot NFT select "Change Pool" then enter https://pool.openchia.io
trans-unit.target: Если у вас уже есть Plot NFT, выберите «Изменить пул», затем введите https://pool.openchia.io.

trans-unit.source: All our software is open source.
trans-unit.target: Все наши программные обеспечения имеют открытый исходный код.

trans-unit.source: Why wait to get your rewards?
Get your reward as soon as possible.
trans-unit.target: Получите ваше вознаграждение как можно скорее.

trans-unit.source: We have nothing to hide. Full blown explorer and live logs.
trans-unit.target: Нам нечего скрывать. Полноценный проводник и живые журналы.

trans-unit.source: Have you asked yourself who are the people running Chia pools? Do you trust them?
trans-unit.target: Вы спрашивали себя, кто управляет пулами Chia? Доверяете ли вы им?

trans-unit.source: We have more than 20 years of combined experience in the software development industry.
trans-unit.target: Мы обладаем более чем 20-летним опытом работы в сфере разработки программного обеспечения.

trans-unit.source: Please meet our partners, together for a better world.
trans-unit.target: Познакомьтесь с нашими партнерами, чтобы сделать мир лучше.

trans-unit.source: They are offering cutting-edge cryptocurrency technology of today and tomorrow. Vivid Stake Pool allows you to stake in Cardano. If you deposit your Fiat Money on your bank account, you will receive 1-3 % profit per year which will be paid after at least a few months. In Cardano it is the opposite: you receive high profits as high as 5-8 % per year which is paid every 5 days!
trans-unit.target: Они предлагают передовые криптовалютные технологии сегодняшнего и завтрашнего дня. Vivid Stake Pool позволяет делать ставки в Cardano. Если вы положите фиатные деньги на свой банковский счет, вы получите 1-3 % прибыли в год, которые будут выплачены по крайней мере через несколько месяцев. В Cardano все наоборот: вы получаете высокую прибыль до 5-8 % в год, которая выплачивается каждые 5 дней!

trans-unit.source: OpenChia believes that in a future blockchain and cryptocurrency can exist without degrading the environment and helping make the world a better place. We believe Chia and Cardano can coexist to help make that happen. If you'd like to know more about Cardano and/or join a legitimate staking pool please visit Vivid Pool.
trans-unit.target: OpenChia believes that in a future blockchain and cryptocurrency can exist without degrading the environment and helping make the world a better place. We believe Chia and Cardano can coexist to help make that happen. If you'd like to know more about Cardano and/or join a legitimate staking pool please visit Vivid Pool.

trans-unit.source: Earn XCH by referring your friends to this pool!
trans-unit.target: Earn XCH by referring your friends to this pool!

trans-unit.source: Refer your friends to this pool using the URL https://openchia.io?referrer=YOUR_LAUNCHER_ID. Replace YOUR_LAUNCHER_ID with the Launcher ID from your Plot NFT.
trans-unit.target: Refer your friends to this pool using the URL https://openchia.io?referrer=YOUR_LAUNCHER_ID. Replace YOUR_LAUNCHER_ID with the Launcher ID from your Plot NFT.

trans-unit.source: Have your friend join the pool and login to the pool website using the Plot NFT login link. He will confirm you are his referrer. (Referrer is filled automatically if he visited the website with your link)
trans-unit.target: Have your friend join the pool and login to the pool website using the Plot NFT login link. He will confirm you are his referrer. (Referrer is filled automatically if he visited the website with your link)

trans-unit.source: You will receive 20% of the pool fee for every payment made to your friend. That value comes out of the pool and not from your friend reward!
trans-unit.target: You will receive 20% of the pool fee for every payment made to your friend. That value comes out of the pool and not from your friend reward!

trans-unit.source: How do I check my referrals?
trans-unit.target: How do I check my referrals?

trans-unit.source: Login to the pool website using your Plot NFT login link and go to the "Referrals" tab.
trans-unit.target: Login to the pool website using your Plot NFT login link and go to the "Referrals" tab.

trans-unit.source: Use of good faith and don't refer yourself in any shape or form.
trans-unit.target: Use of good faith and don't refer yourself in any shape or form.

trans-unit.source: Do not attempt close loop of referral. e.g. A -> B -> C -> A.
trans-unit.target: Do not attempt close loop of referral. e.g. A -> B -> C -> A.

trans-unit.source: We reserve the right to change fees for new referrals at any time.
trans-unit.target: We reserve the right to change fees for new referrals at any time.

trans-unit.source: Let's get in touch on any of these platforms.
trans-unit.target: Let's get in touch on any of these platforms.

trans-unit.source: They're offering cutting edge cryptocurrency technology of today and tomorrow. Cardano is a cryptocurrency network and open source project that aims to run a public blockchain platform for smart contracts. Cardano's internal cryptocurrency is called ADA!
trans-unit.target: They're offering cutting edge cryptocurrency technology of today and tomorrow. Cardano is a cryptocurrency network and open source project that aims to run a public blockchain platform for smart contracts. Cardano's internal cryptocurrency is called ADA!

trans-unit.source: OpenChia believes in a future that blockchain and cryptocurrency can exist without degrading the environment and helping make the world a better place. We believe Chia and Cardano can coexist to help make that happen. If you'd like to know more about Cardano and/or join a legitimate staking pool please visit Vivid Pool.

We believe Chia and Cardano can coexist to help make that happen. If you'd like to know more about Cardano and/or join a legitimate staking pool please visit Vivid Pool.

trans-unit.source: Vivid Stake Pool allows you to stake in Cardano. If you deposit your Fiat Money on your bank account you will receive 1-3 % profit per year which will be paid after at least a few months. In Cardano it is the opposite: you receive high profits as high as 5-8 % per year which is paid every 5 days!
trans-unit.target: Vivid Stake Pool allows you to stake in Cardano. If you deposit your Fiat Money on your bank account you will receive 1-3 % profit per year which will be paid after at least a few months. In Cardano it is the opposite: you receive high profits as high as 5-8 % per year which is paid every 5 days!
Воспользуйтесь 0% платой за пул до октября 2021 года.

trans-unit.source: Payouts will happen within 5 minutes of the farmed block. These terms are subjected to change and will be communicated 1 week prior to the change in this website and on Discord channel.
trans-unit.target: Выплаты будут происходить в течение 5 минут после фермерского блока. Эти условия могут быть изменены и будут сообщены за 1 неделю до изменений на этом веб-сайте и на канале Discord.

trans-unit.source: Verify plotnft and copy contract address:
trans-unit.target: Подтвердите plotnft и скопируйте адрес контракта:

trans-unit.source: If you already have a Plot NFT select "Change Pool" then enter https://pool.openchia.io.
trans-unit.target: Если у вас уже есть Plot NFT, выберите «Изменить пул», затем введите https://pool.openchia.io.

trans-unit.source: Go to "Plots" menu in the left menu.
trans-unit.target: Go to "Plots" menu in the left menu.

trans-unit.source: No blocks found by this farmed!
trans-unit.target: На этой ферме блоков не найдено!

trans-unit.source: chia plots create -c <contract address from above>
trans-unit.target: chia plots create -c <contract address from above>

trans-unit.source: We use PPLNS (Pay Per Last N Shares) to distribute rewards. When a block is won, we look at the valid partials (shares) submitted by all users in the pool since last payout and distribute the reward value based on your share among all farmers in the pool. In our case Last N Shares refers to partials since last payout. We believe this system is far more fair for less frequent rewards (when Last N Shares means only last few hours), since people contributing for more time will get more rewards. Once our estimated time to win gets below 48 hours we plan on changing the Last N Shares to 48 hours of valid partials.
trans-unit.target: We use PPLNS (Pay Per Last N Shares) to distribute rewards. When a block is won, we look at the valid partials (shares) submitted by all users in the pool since last payout and distribute the reward value based on your share among all farmers in the pool. In our case Last N Shares refers to partials since last payout. We believe this system is far more fair for less frequent rewards (when Last N Shares means only last few hours), since people contributing for more time will get more rewards.
